content: should be kept in mind 1 this pattern uses a few different yarn weights and if you change one you have to change them all in order for the look to remain consistent 2 gauge is more important than hook size if you are too tight or too loose to meet gauge go up or down a hook size accordingly 3 when picking nylons get the largest and cheapest you can because they stretch best i get mine at the dollar store and they are perfect i hope you love the pattern and enjoy making the chubby bunny happy crocheting ~valerie © 2019 valerie church | www oldsoulcrochetco com @oldsoulcrochetco www facebook com/oldsoulcrochetco 3 8 mm hook & super bulky a yarn head / body 1 magic_ring single_crochet 8 8 2 increase x 8 16 3 single_crochet increase x 8 24 4 single_crochet 3 increase x 6 30 5 single_crochet 9 increase x 3 33 bobble stitch 6 single_crochet 10 increase x 3 36 7 single_crochet 5 decrease single_crochet 5 x 3 33 8 single_crochet 9 decrease x 3 30 9 single_crochet decrease x 10 20 10 slip_stitch 20 20 11 single_crochet 3 increase x 5 25 12 single_crochet 14 bobble single_crochet 6 bobble single_crochet 3 25 1 2 to make the bobble stitch wrap the yarn yarn over and pull through the first two continued on page 5 around the hook then insert it through loops and there will be two loops on the the next stitch yarn over and pull hook through 3 4 5 repeat steps 1-2 four more times and you yarn over and pull through all stitches to push the center of the bobble out toward will have 6 loops on the hook complete the bobble you then continue crocheting according to the pattern bobble stitch tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=2avg81xqiac&t=1s © 2019 valerie church | www oldsoulcrochetco com @oldsoulcrochetco www facebook com/oldsoulcrochetco 4 8 mm hook & super bulky a yarn head/body cont 13 single_crochet 25 25 14 single_crochet 25 25 15 increase single_crochet 4 x 3 single_crochet 10 28 stuffing 16 single_crochet 28 28 17 single_crochet 17 bobble single_crochet 6 bobble single_crochet 3 28 tip 18 single_crochet 5 decrease x 4 24 11 start stuffing lightly stuff nylon with fiberfill 19 single_crochet decrease x 8 16 20 single_crochet 2 decrease x 4 12 21 decrease x 6 6 knot nylon and cut excess cut 5 yarn tail and tie off 2 3 gather remaining stitches place nylon into the head of the bunny next stuff the body full of fiberfill add and stuff completely additional fiberfill every two row 1 2 3 4 cut a 1 tail of nylon and knot use hook or yarn needle to pull the yarn tail tight till the knot off and weave in the yarn off cut 6 yarn tail gather remaining stitches by hole closes if the nylon sitcks end working through the outside out at all poke it into the loop of each stitch
